overview: On the laptop desk: A fresh graduate from the film department was nominated for an Oscar for a LGBTQ-themed short, and was invited by his hometown Chongqing TV station for an online interview. During his interview with the beautiful reporter, many ridiculous things happened, which made the interview impossible to proceed smoothly...
tagline: A fresh graduate from the film department was nominated for an Oscar for an LGBTQ-themed short, and was invited by his hometown Chongqing TV station for an online interview.
title: Chongqing Oscar
